thread.title: Rising Country Star Alyssa Bagley to Headline 2015 Energy Day Festival
thread.title_full: Rising Country Star Alyssa Bagley to Headline 2015 Energy Day Festival

title: Rising Country Star Alyssa Bagley to Headline 2015 Energy Day Festival
text:
Rising Country Star Alyssa Bagley to Headline 2015 Energy Day Festival Family Festivities Include Interactive Exhibits, Live Music and KidsRockEnergy Booth 
Rising Country Star Alyssa Bagley to Headline 2015 Energy Day Festival in Houston (Photo: Business Wire) Download 
--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Media Alert: 
What: Nashville artist and native Texan, Alyssa Bagley , to perform at the 2015 Energy Day Festival , one of Houston’s premiere family festivals. Children will have the opportunity to learn about energy and pose for photos as rock stars in the SmartEnergy IP™ KidsRockEnergy Booth. 
Where: Sam Houston Park, 1000 Bagby Street, Houston, Texas 
When: Energy Day is taking place on October 17, 2015 from 11:00am to 4:00pm. Alyssa takes the stage at 2:30pm. 
Details: Rising country music artist, Alyssa Bagley, will take the stage at the 2015 Energy Day Festival this Saturday at 2:30pm. She’ll be doing meet and greets at the KidsRockEnergy Booth before and after the performance. 
Children can pose as rock stars and learn about energy at the KidsRockEnergy Booth (#24) sponsored by SmartEnergy IP. 
For an interview with Alyssa or to learn more about the Energy Day Festival, contact Kristin Marcell at kristin@smartmarkusa.com or (215)504-4272. 
About SmartEnergy IP 
SmartEnergy IP is a division of SmartMark Communications , a global strategic communications company, focused on consumer energy education and engagement. Contacts
